original_text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.
korean_text: 이제는 전에 멀리 있던 너희가 그리스도 예수 안에서 그리스도의 피로 가까워졌느니라

sentences.original_text: ye who sometimes were far off
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 한 때 멀리 있던 자들이

sentences.original_text: are made nigh by the blood of Christ
